channel.title: Daily Feed (Last 48 Hours, Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Last 48 Hours, Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: Rubio’s ‘Reassuring’ Relationship Repair
item.description: The chief U.S. diplomat put a friendlier spin on the Trump administration’s stern message to Europe.

item.title: Elbridge Colby: ‘NATO Is Actually Stronger Than Ever.’
item.description: The Pentagon’s top policymaker answers questions about the White House’s commitment to Europe’s security.

item.title: Russia ‘Not Serious’ About Peace Deal, Lindsey Graham Says
item.description: The Republican senator’s comments contradict U.S. President Donald Trump’s position on Russia.

item.title: America offers Europe warmer words, but a deep chill remains
item.description: Marco Rubio praises NATO allies in Munich, but most remain wary

item.title: Rubio to Europe: “We Care Deeply”
item.description: In a widely anticipated speech at the Munich Security Conference, U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio described concerns about a shared "Western civilization" as reason for being "a little direct" with Europe.
